title: Ammonia synthesis equil - increase amount of NH3

content.prompt: NH3(g) was synthesized at 200°C in the presence of a powdered Os(s) catalyst, leading to the equilibrium system represented above. Which of the following changes would result in more NH3(g) in the mixture after equilibrium is reestablished?

choices.label: Replacing the powdered Os(s) with a solid cube of Os(s) of the same total mass
Increasing the temperature of the system to 250°C at constant pressure

skill.text: 2.F: Explain how modifications to an experimental procedure will alter results.
